0.1.name: wordpress/sexy-rss-footer
0.1.description:
With Sexy RSS Footer you can add everything you want to the end of every feed entry. Backlink to the site? Sure. Number of comments? Sure. Flattr link? Sure. Something totaly different? Yepp, even that!

Suggestions for more replacement variables highly welcome!
